mapper.select: SELECT cmcc_prov_id,cmcc_prvd_nm_short,sum(weigui_subs_cnt) weiguiCnt, sum(weigui_subs_cnt)/sum(tol_subs_cnt) *100 as zper FROM hpeapb.sum_jtkd_1102_cty WHERE prvd_id = #{provinceCode} AND aud_trm = #{currSumEndDate} GROUP BY cmcc_prov_id,cmcc_prvd_nm_short order by 3 desc

SELECT aud_trm_begin, aud_trm as aud_trm_end, prvd_id, short_name, cmcc_prov_id, cmcc_prvd_nm_short, weigui_subs_cnt, tol_subs_cnt, per*100 as per FROM hpeapb.sum_jtkd_1102_cty WHERE prvd_id = #{params.provinceCode} and aud_trm = #{params.currSumEndDate} order by weigui_subs_cnt desc,cmcc_prov_id

SELECT aud_trm_begin, aud_trm as aud_trm_end, prvd_id, short_name, cmcc_prov_id, cmcc_prvd_nm_short, weigui_subs_cnt, tol_subs_cnt, per*100 as per FROM hpeapb.sum_jtkd_1102_cty WHERE prvd_id = #{provinceCode} and aud_trm = #{currSumEndDate} order by weigui_subs_cnt desc,cmcc_prov_id
